member.name: IInkHostWorkItem.Invoke
member.summary: Executes the ink operation on an IInkDesktopHost object thread.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInkHostWorkItem
member.summary: An IInkHostWorkItem object represents an ink operation to be executed on an IInkDesktopHost object thread.
